thread.title: Dell to acquire EMC for $67B in largest technology deal ever
thread.title_full: Dell to acquire EMC for $67B in largest technology deal ever

title: Dell to acquire EMC for $67B in largest technology deal ever
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: Money - Today 
Dell, along with MSD Partners and Silver Lake, will acquire data storage company EMC Corporation (EMC) for $67 billion or about $33.15 a sha...
